item.title: All students nationwide will get new textbooks on Jan 1: Advisor Bidhan
item.description: Students across Bangladesh will receive new textbooks on Jan 1, Primary and Mass Education Advisor Bidhan Ranjan Roy Poddar has said. He confirmed the development on Saturday after attending a ceremony at the National Academy for Primary Education (NEP) in Mymensingh, bdnews24.com reports.
